name: A Tower in the Forrest
description:
"A Tower in the Forrest "is a short game about climbing a tower. Turn windmills to activate platforms, open doors or create shortcuts.

OST:

Feel free to download the OST and use it youtube videos or anything else if you are interested in that. 

License:

A Tower in the Forest OST is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

 

Controls:

Keyboard:

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Glide: Up in the air 

Stop Glide: Down

Jump: Space

Pause: P or Esc

Controller:

Movement: left stick or D - pad

Glide: top face button or D - pad up

Stop Glide:  top face button again or D - pad down

Jump: bottom face button

Pause: start

Made for the Cozy Autumn 2022 Game Jam

Tools used:

Godot 3, Aseprite, Audacity, Ableton live 11, Tilesetter

Additional Assets:

Some sounds from mixkit.co
